View the rooms Book online

Rates and policies:

Annual closing period

From November 1, 2023, to March 28, 2024, inclusive. Re-opening on March 29, 2024.

Check-in

Our rooms will be available from 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM. To ensure the best welcome, please inform us of any arrivals outside these hours.

Check-out

In order to welcome new guests in the best conditions, our rooms must be vacated no later than 11:00 AM.

Breakfast

Breakfast is served from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

Payment Methods

Cash, credit cards (VISA and Mastercard). Your reservation is guaranteed upon receipt of a 30% deposit of the total stay.

Cancellation policy:

- Cancellation 30 days prior to scheduled arrival date: refund of the 30 % deposit

- Cancellation less then the required 30 day time period: Your 30 % deposit will be forfeited

- No shows without prior cancellation: the full rental amount is due

Children

The Villa is not suitable for young children. For safety reasons, we welcome children over the age of 7.

Pets

We regret that we cannot accept your pets.

For your comfort and safety, maximum occupancy per room is 2 guests. Extra beds for additional guests, are not available.
Villa Thalassa is a non-smoking establishment.
Access to the Villa Thalassa is strictly limited to our guests.
